about_the_game:
A hero's journey is filled with many great challenges. Like saving the townfolk from a mysterious invading army from another dimension, that's headed up by a hooded figure who's actually being manipulated by an otherworldly dragon who'll morph into a demon when close to being defeated. It's all in a day's work for Bravely Scoop in Bravely Scoop IV: Eternal Fantasy!

This DLC contains a custom skin for the Scoop of Justice in Awesomenauts. You need to have the Scoop of Justice available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game. This skin contains a fully customized voice set!
detailed_description:
A hero's journey is filled with many great challenges. Like saving the townfolk from a mysterious invading army from another dimension, that's headed up by a hooded figure who's actually being manipulated by an otherworldly dragon who'll morph into a demon when close to being defeated. It's all in a day's work for Bravely Scoop in Bravely Scoop IV: Eternal Fantasy!

This DLC contains a custom skin for the Scoop of Justice in Awesomenauts. You need to have the Scoop of Justice available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game. This skin contains a fully customized voice set!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection
